Class ScatterRecord

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.apps.pathtracer.ScatterRecord
public class ScatterRecord extends Object
Represents a record of scattering events in a path tracer. This class is currently empty and serves as a placeholder for future implementation.
